lead_paragraph: Madison Avenue, be afraid. Be very afraid.

headline.print_headline: Amateurs’ Efforts Highlight First-Half Ad Bowl

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp

abstract: A federal jury rejected a former Coca-Cola secretary’s claim that she was duped by two accomplices and convicted her on Friday of conspiring to steal trade secrets from the world’s largest beverage maker in an effort to sell them to its rival, Pepsi. The former secretary, Joya Williams, showed no visible reaction when the verdict was announced. She remains free on bond, pending sentencing.
lead_paragraph: A federal jury rejected a former Coca-Cola secretary’s claim that she was duped by two accomplices and convicted her on Friday of conspiring to steal trade secrets from the world’s largest beverage maker in an effort to sell them to its rival, Pepsi. The former secretary, Joya Williams, showed no visible reaction when the verdict was announced. She remains free on bond, pending sentencing.

headline.main: Ex-Secretary at Coke Guilty of Trade-Secrets Theft
